page.title: 07Wawne, entertainment.
page.content:
The{school}is small and was built in the early 20th Century, a newer block added in the 60's. It is backed by a large field. This is used for the Womens Institute show, and on alternate years the Scout's fete and the Church Garden Party. The school itself is a venue for adult evening classes.
The{Village Hall}offers dance classes for the younger children and discos for the older ones and adult, as well as being a meeting place for the Scouts, Guides, Cubs and Brownies - who have a communal band.
Next to the Village Hall, the{church {room}is a meeting place for the Derby and Joan club and flower arranging classes as well as church events, like Harvest Supper.
